es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command
Class UndoCommand

java.lang.Object
  es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command.Command
      es.ucm.fdi.lps.p4.command.UndoCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class UndoCommand
extends Command

Represents a Take command from the player that undoes the last executed command.

  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.undoCommand" which default value is "undo".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.undoCommand.abbrev" which default value is "u".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "keyword.undoCommand.alt" which default value is "reverse".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "message.undoCommand.help" which default value is "undo|u|reverse".
  • It uses a command-specific property called "message.undoCommand.noExecutedCommands" which default value is "There is no command that can be undone.".

Constructor Detail

UndoCommand

public UndoCommand(Game game)
Constructs an Undo command (as an specific type of Command) that has access to a given game. Initially the command is unparsed and unexecuted. Default configuration is assumed at this moment.

Parameters:
game - The game.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The argument 'game' cannot be null.

UndoCommand

public UndoCommand(Game game,
                   java.util.Properties config)
Constructs an Undo command (as an specific type of Command) that has access to a given game. Initially the command is unparsed and unexecuted. The properties defined in the given configuration override those of the default configuration.

Parameters:
game - The game.
config - The configuration.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The arguments 'game' and 'config' cannot be null.
